title: Protein Kalkylator
metaDescription: Gratis Protein Kalkylator - Beräkna your daily protein intake baserat på din vikt, activity level, and goals. Optimize your nutrition.

activityLevels.veryActive: Very Active (intense daily träning or physical job)

info.title: Om Protein
info.description: Proteins are essential macronutrients that play a crucial role in building and repairing tissues, producing enzymes and hormones, and maintaining muscle mass. The amount of protein you need depends on your body weight, physical activity level, and health goals.
info.note: Note: This calculator provides general estimates. Consult a healthcare professional or nutritionist for personalized recommendations, especially if you have specific medical conditions.
